Class BigTwoCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
      • BigTwoCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class BigTwoCard
extends Card
    Subclass of card that inherits the properties of card. Modified according to the rule of the BigTwo Card game. Overrides compareTo method.
    Author:
    choijaewon
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BigTwoCard(int suit, int rank)
      Constructor setting the suit and rank of the card used in the BigTwo card game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      int compareTo(Card card)
      Overridden method from superclass Card.

        equals, getRank, getSuit, hashCode, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BigTwoCard

        public BigTwoCard(int suit,
                  int rank)
        Constructor setting the suit and rank of the card used in the BigTwo card game.
        Parameters:
        suit - integer value of suit to be modified according to corresponding card suit.
        rank - integer value of rank to be modified according to corresponding card rank.

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card card)
        Overridden method from superclass Card. Compares the BigTwo card for order according to the BigTwo game. Ace and Two get bigger value than they do in normal cards.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Card>
        Overrides:
        compareTo in class Card
        Parameters:
        card - card that is compared to the card using this method.
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this card is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified card.
